message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway, but I need to sell it to you for at least $180.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product. I hope this meets your needs while staying within my budget.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to make a profit. I can meet you at $170, but that's as low as I can go.
